website_summaries.verdict: This easy to handle, beautiful piece of luggage is durable and practical.
pros: Lightweight with a lot of space
A carry-on size that offers outside compartments as well as inside zipper compartments
Expands for more space as needed
cons: The laptop padding area could be more protective

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design of handle - still best looking suitcase around
customer_reviews.text: Loved my Avolve 1.0 - my favorite suitcase ever. After 5 years, I lost my old one and was time for a replacement. A few changes to new generations feels like a downgrade. :( Especially the terrible design of the handle release latch, that accidentally gets pushed 15x when pushing your suitcase. Still, the best "looking" suitcase around for frequent travelers who want to spend $200-300 max on a carry-on suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Margolis

customer_reviews.title: It looks very sophisticated and the quality is good. Its thinner than other models
customer_reviews.text: It looks very sophisticated and the quality is good. Its thinner than other models, so you can't fit too much and sometimes it will fell to the front ir the back (you need to put the wheels on the opposite direction to keep it standing). I would buy Victorinox but the model with the bigger wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this item
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this item, and its amazing in so many ways, except that's it's barely usable. It will always fall front side to the floor no matter how loaded \ empty it is The front row wheels axis and the back row are too close, so its like the center of gravity of the case is unbalanced. No matter what you do, it takes the slightest push to make this case fall face first to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Hisham

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but a tad bit small!
customer_reviews.text: This bag came with the dimensions mentioned so the size was no surprise. Compared to some other carry on bags I've seen it is somewhat small but my guess is that it will be a good size for carry on on almost all flights. Used this to pack for a week long trip and it had plenty of room for my clothes. It rolls very smoothly and has been great to use.
customer_reviews.author: ryoon4690

customer_reviews.title: I did love it, until the handle became un-usable now 1
customer_reviews.text: I did love it, until the handle became un-usable now 1.5 years later. After spending $300, I would expect a luggage to sustain a 5-10year life span. I am now trying to get in touch with Victorinox to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Haller

customer_reviews.title: This is not a carry on!
customer_reviews.text: The description of this bag, when I purchased it 9 months ago, said it was carry on size. Unfortunately I didn't research this point and bought it for my frequent flyer husband as a gift. It is a great bag, everything you expect from Victorinox. However, it is not carry on size. Depending on the airline it is 2-4 inches too long. Had I known this, I would not have purchased this bag, but we have it, we use it for checked baggage and it is great quality. I see the description has since changed. Happy travels.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Distinctly larger than some other carry-ons (such as travelpro), ...
customer_reviews.text: Distinctly larger than some other carry-ons (such as travelpro), however the extension handle isn't as comfy and the flush top and side handles are a bit difficult to grab. However the additional space is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Chertov

customer_reviews.title: I love how well made this luggage is
customer_reviews.text: I had other Victorinox luggage that is now looking a little worn. I love how well made this luggage is. I can pack a lot in it. I like having outside compartments which are useful to access items that are needed.
customer_reviews.author: LEF

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight spacious practical
customer_reviews.text: I never review but this carry on deserves it! Super light weight and spacious! Zippers are very good qulity and the design is very nice for the price. Its material is not hard and does not get dented as many other does. Highly recommended, used it once and received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole Avolve series. Super well made, durable, and gets great reviews from heavy travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Markland

customer_reviews.title: First time traveling with this bag, the zipper slider ...
customer_reviews.text: First time traveling with this bag, the zipper slider came off one side of the zipper rendering the bag unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Mistenner

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great size
customer_reviews.text: Durable, lighter than most smaller suitcases I’ve owned. Great color and plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on!
customer_reviews.text: We looked at many suitcases we could carry on and this one is perfect! Holds more than we thought it would...easy maneuverability...and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Royer

customer_reviews.title: It was much smaller than i expected Great quality but
customer_reviews.text: It was much smaller than i expected Great quality but, if you are looking for 21 inch space ...then this won’t suffice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: versitile, light
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for a 3 day trip with a sport coat and extra pair of shoes. I've had no trouble with it tipping over as I saw in one review.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel companion.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. One of my friends had it and I was able to snag out of Amazon on a good deal. Perfect for traveling through Europe, where need it to fit under the seat sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, durable, & fits in overhead
customer_reviews.text: To clear up any ambiguity: This bag fits in all overhead bins - even regional jets. I fly twice a week and I've yet to have any issues. Otherwise, it's very lightweight, durable, and looks sharp. What more could you want from a carry-on?
customer_reviews.author: Adam C Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole Avolve series. Super well made, durable, and gets great reviews from heavy travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Markland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carry on
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carry on. It is small lightweight but expandable and very functional for carry on. I can go for a week with briefcase and this unit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alcs2

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: I travel extensively for work. Nice bag ... kind of small for a multi-day trip but perfect for one or two nights on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Thomas

customer_reviews.title: V3.0 is a slight DOWNgrade from Avolve V2, which is an EXCELLENT bag
customer_reviews.text: I had the Avolve "V2" bag and have been around the world with it several times. Fantastic reliability and quality. So I quite looked forward to the "upgrade" to V3.0. Sadly it was a downgrade, albeit only a small one. If I had to do it over again, I'd just buy another Avolve V2 bag - about the same price, still on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage. It is so much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: jason jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a carry on bag
customer_reviews.text: This is not a carry on bag. I dI'd like that I could pack everything I own in this bag, but there is no way it would have fit in an overhead bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of clothing and really easy to roll!!!
customer_reviews.author: GMH

customer_reviews.title: I love this luggage - there is not a single thing ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage - there is not a single thing I would suggest as an improvement. It is huge inside, but meets airline specifications. The spinners are smooth handling and sturdy, too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: This one is even better than the previous excellent models
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3.0 after trying my husband's 2.0... and now he's the one with suitcase envy! This one is even better than the previous excellent models, easy to use and roll, I love that they've changed the zipper placement so you don't confuse the zipper to open it with the zipper to expand it. I love having the option to put my laptop in this roller bag if I don't feel like carrying it in my shoulder bag. Great design and great quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: Berylind

customer_reviews.title: it's just a scam it was never said that the product was unusable
customer_reviews.text: it's just a scam it was never said that the product was unusable
customer_reviews.author: Víctor amoretti

customer_reviews.title: VERY BAD QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: VERY BAD QUALITY....We gave this as a gift to our son and it only lasted a few months traveling on business.
customer_reviews.author: KEla

customer_reviews.title: The zippers are kind of stiff
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the way the zippers stick. They're kind of stiff
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Piana

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox is a great brand. Love this suitcase for checked luggage. I own several in different sizes!
customer_reviews.author: jgmamazon

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT, EASY, GOOD FOR FLYING
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy, good compartmentalization, fits easily in overhead plane storage.
customer_reviews.author: 50 Stars

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, but too simple a design.
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. I found the inside storage to be too simple. There was a lack of side pockets on the inside and few separators for the main compartment. Not that it felt poorly made, just simple in design. If you pack your clothes and items in one large compartment you'll be quite happy with this bag. I prefer separate compartments and interior pockets to keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Fields

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this suitcase. The material looks great, is very strong and incredibly lightweight. The details are top notch from the soft feel of the handles to the included TSA lock and all the compartments in between, it really is as nice as you could ask for especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kornfeld

customer_reviews.title: Good and reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good design for segmenting and storage. Zippers are wonky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: As advertized. Lots of room. Well made. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F. Melia

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase - I just hope it's durable
customer_reviews.text: One of the handles broke on my first trip using the bag. And was promptly replace and I am hoping it was just a defect. Other than that, it's a great bag! The wheels work great, very smooth, and the suitcase itself is extremely light. I just hope this replacement bag holds up. If it does, I would easily give st least 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: She actually recommended the the older model which was a little smaller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a recommendation of a friend. She actually recommended the the older model which was a little smaller. I travel for months at a time and the slightly larger size was a better fit for guys because out clothing tales up a little more space that ladies. Very happy with the price, best I could find. Well packaged. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit case
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit case. Rolls so easy and good size for a week long trip! Only complaints is that one of the zippers broke off the first time we flew with this suit case. Don’t know if it was a defect or the airline but it’s an easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag is pretty good. Got it for $249, literally 2 weeks ago tho.....soooooooo, not super happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description...
customer_reviews.text: Holds less than its dimensions would indicate. Would work ok for short trips of 2-3 days but insufficient space to hold a weeks worth of clothes. There are other International carry-ons that hold much more, like the Travelpro Crew 11.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

product_meta.title: Victorinox Avolve 3.0 Softside Expandable Spinner Luggage, Black, Carry-On, Expandable (24")
product_meta.description: Size:Carry-On, Expandable (24")| Color:BlackConstructed with a lightweight, 100% pure polycarbonate frame and a durable nylon exterior fabric designed exclusively for Victorinox. Aircraft-grade, one-touch, dual-trolley aluminum handle system locks into three different positions - 94 cm (37 inch ), 99 cm (39 inch ) and 104 cm (41 inch ) - to accommodate travelers of various heights. Four premium, 50mm Hinomoto wheels ensure smooth roll across any surface and provide 360 Degree, zero weight-in-hand maneuverability. Spacious main packing area expands 3 cm (1.2 inch ) for additional packing capacity. Padded front u-shaped zippered compartment holds a 15.6 inch laptop. Two quick-access front pockets hold tickets and other essentials. Interior organization includes a large zippered mesh lid pocket and a zippered mesh hanging pocket containing dedicated storage for a Lifestyle Accessories 4.0 CheckSmart luggage tracking device (sold separately). X-shaped compression straps cover a greater surface area to keep folded items secure. Top retractable haul handle and bottom grab handle for easy carrying. Integrated ID tag for security and convenience. Lockable coil zippers provide superior burst strength on the main compartment and laptop compartment. Custom zipper pulls feature a thumb groove inspired by the Swiss Army Knife. Travel Sentry Approved combination lock easily secures belongings and allows U.S. airport security screeners to open the lock without destroying it and relock it after inspection. The Access Lock Combination Recovery Program allows you to register your lock combination on victorinox.com and recover it if it is ever forgotten. Covered by the Global 10-Year Limited Warranty .
feature_bullets: 100 percent pure polycarbonate frame and a durable nylon exterior fabric.It offers superior protection in the cabin and on your adventures
Padded front u-shaped zippered compartment holds a 15.6 inch laptop

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
